title: Pls nerf Yasuo, Disable Riven and fix this stupid early game Meta.
body: Am I popular in Gameplay boards now?

replies.body:
Actually, isn't everyone doing this? To become famous you should do something noone else does.
Like, "buff Aurelion Sol" or something.
You're supposed to to be in the Gameplay Boards for a post like this. The Gameplay boards is the first room to your right, buddy.
